statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (8,-5) and (2,11).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{{11}-{\left(-{5}\right)}}}{{{2}-{\left({8}\right)}}}=\frac{{16}}{{-{{6}}}} which reduces to \displaystyle-\frac{{8}}{{3}} (if it's not already reduced)
